backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, agent registry with pre-populated agents (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, etc.), debate state management, file metadata storage, and access control integration with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, configuration, and utilities for a debate/agent management application with speech recognition and Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/.env: Local development environment configuration specifying backend canister ID and DFX network set to 'local'.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment configuration with backend canister ID and DFX network set to 'ic'.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette defining CSS variables for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale colors and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for 'The Gang' application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with three tabs (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health), Internet Identity authentication, debate management with voice/text input, transcript download, and agent registry display.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table displaying system infrastructure vitals with toggle switches for agent status, memory usage progress bars, diagnostics modal, and reset agents button.
frontend/src/components/CrashLogModal.ts: Dialog modal component displaying agent diagnostics and telemetry information with monospace styling and green terminal aesthetic.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays a scrollable transcript of debate messages with speaker badges (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM), text-to-speech controls for each message, and an emergency mode indicator. Auto-scrolls to the latest message when the transcript updates.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop an active debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend abort mutation. Shows loading state while the abort request is pending.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements a push-to-talk button using speech recognition that starts/stops listening on click and calls onTranscriptComplete callback when speech recognition stops with new transcript. Includes browser compatibility check and error display.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file uploads (drag-drop, manual, camera) by chunking large files and routing them to appropriate agents via backend. Displays upload progress, routing results, and supports both text and image file types with preview generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing it with Internet Identity when authenticated or as anonymous otherwise. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle. Exports useInternetIdentity hook and InternetIdentityProvider component for authentication flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including debate status polling, starting/aborting debates, clearing boardroom, routing documents, and managing agent statuses. Each mutation automatically invalidates relevant queries on success.
React hook that wraps the Web Speech Recognition API to provide voice-to-text transcription with start/stop controls, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook that wraps the Web Speech Synthesis API to provide text-to-speech functionality with voice selection (preferring British male voices) and speaking state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub for future Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection integration that would trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, plus base typography and code font styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes HTML table tags from text and converts URLs and markdown links into clickable anchor elements with styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration with React plugin, path aliases, environment variable injection for canister IDs, and local development proxy for API requests.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural notes, known issues, and a pending feature request (AR-1) to add telemetry actor initialization in useActor.ts hook.
